content:
Oh, I haven't thought about what to say.
...(thinking)
The Astralink station festival?
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
In my old neighborhood, we had fireworks during every festival and holiday.
Since many supernatural creatures and oddities are "afraid" of fireworks,
the road signs were definitely safe.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
I just heard neighbors talking about how Mobai knew about the fireworks beforehand.
I think, on the contrary, he didn't know.
He was just keeping his cool on the surface.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
Oh, not living in the same house,
but still an unexpected kind
of distance.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
But why did <color=#8AAB4B>Mobai</color> sneak away?
Just now.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
But Mobai said,
This is <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s
first activity as a liaison.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
Oh, to be invited by <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>
to move to <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>,
I must say, it's quite unexpected.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
...(thinking)
I never thought someone
would want to live with me.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
I wasn't planning to get involved.
The idea of everyone gathering together to put up road signs...
I'm not interested in that sort of thing.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
...Oh well, it's going to be noisy here anyway with the party going on.
Might as well take a look.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊

content:
When I pull out the "Monster Head,"
he appears by your side.
Oh, I mean, he doesn't need to worry about the Fireworks hurting you.
info: 车站建成庆典-夙夜_友邻任务闲聊
